summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.9°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.8°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 18%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 11912 lux) and cloud levels (up 503 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15935 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), and cloud levels (up 403 m) when compared to today.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 436m to 1505m and averaged 446.0m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and slight breezes. Drizzle or light rain possible, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and weak sunlight because of clouds. Similar weather conditions should remain.
